mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.INCOME_TYPE as incomeType, a.IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION as isCapitalInjection, a.PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS as percentageOfFunds, a.SOURCE_DESC as sourceDesc, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , INCOME_TYPE , IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION , PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS , SOURCE_DESC , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{incomeType} , #{isCapitalInjection} , #{percentageOfFunds} , #{sourceDesc} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
INCOME_TYPE ,
IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION ,
PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS ,
SOURCE_DESC ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{incomeType} ,
#{isCapitalInjection} ,
#{percentageOfFunds} ,
#{sourceDesc} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
INCOME_TYPE = #{incomeType} ,
IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION = #{isCapitalInjection} ,
PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS = #{percentageOfFunds} ,
SOURCE_DESC = #{sourceDesc} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , INCOME_TYPE , IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION , PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS , SOURCE_DESC , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.incomeType} , #{item.isCapitalInjection} , #{item.percentageOfFunds} , #{item.sourceDesc} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , INCOME_TYPE = #{item.incomeType} , IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION = #{item.isCapitalInjection} , PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS = #{item.percentageOfFunds} , SOURCE_DESC = #{item.sourceDesc} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , INCOME_TYPE = #{incomeType} , IS_CAPITAL_INJECTION = #{isCapitalInjection} , PERCENTAGE_OF_FUNDS = #{percentageOfFunds} , SOURCE_DESC = #{sourceDesc} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_CO_WEALTH_SOURCE a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
